name: Password Manager
description: Effortlessly manage your passwords.About this templateThe Password Manager is a Notion template designed to help you keep track of your passwords with ease. The template comes with two buttons, one for showing and one for hiding your passwords. By using the template, you can easily add passwords for some of the most common websites, such as Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter.Who is this template for?This template is perfect for anyone who wants to keep their passwords organized and easily accessibl
